articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Google will block sideloading of unverified Android apps starting next year - Ars Technica
articles.description: Google says it’s no different than checking IDs at the airport.

articles.author: Simon Sharwood
articles.title: Mysterious X-37B spaceplane flies again, with 'quantum GPS' - theregister.com
articles.description: : Satnav birds would be a high-priority target in war. This tech could be a more resilient alternative
articles.content:
The US militarys Boeing-built X-37B spaceplane is in space again for its eighth mission.
The X-37B is an uncrewed craft that, just like the USAs retired Space Shuttle, launches on a rocket and after… [+2285 chars]
